price: Ambaye ametengeneza vizuri umbo la kila kitu; na akaanzisha kumuumba mtu kwa udongo.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡسَنَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلۡقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ مِن طِينٖ
footnotes: Aliye umba kila kitu kwa ustadi, kwa mujibu wa inavyo hitajia hikima yake, na akaanza kumuumba mtu wa mwanzo kwa udongo,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhī aḥsana kulla shayin khalaqahu wabada-a khalqa al-insāni min ṭīnin
